title: All the ESG Investing Terms, Explained
sub_head: B Corp.? Exclusionary screening? Stranded asset? Here is a look at what those and other key ESG terms and phrases mean
body:
More investors are looking at environmental, social and governance factors when choosing investments for their portfolios. But with that focus comes a whole new languageâ€”one that may leave some investors baffled.
So whether you call it ESG, sustainable, socially responsible or impact investing, here are some of the terms you need to know.
